datasets.name: ds_financial
datasets.query: SELECT total_transaction_value, approved_value, declined_value, avg_transaction_amount, total_transactions, approved_count, declined_count FROM __CATALOG__.__SCHEMA__.v_executive_kpis LIMIT 1

datasets.name: ds_decline_value
datasets.query: SELECT decline_reason, total_declined_value, decline_count, recoverable_pct FROM __CATALOG__.__SCHEMA__.v_top_decline_reasons ORDER BY total_declined_value DESC
